text: The Ministry of State Property of the Republic of Croatia () is the ministry in the government of Croatia responsible for state property management. ==List of ministers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- !align=center width="18"|# !width="190"|Minister !colspan=2 width="80"|Party !width="130"|Term start !width="130"|Term end !width=70|Days in office |- |1 |Goran Marić |style="background-color: " width="1px"| |HDZ |15 November 2016 |15 July 2019 |align=right | |- |2 |Mario Banožić |style="background-color: " width="1px"| |HDZ |22 July 2019 |Incumbent |align=right | |} === Ministers of Privatisation and Property Management (1995–1999) === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- !align=center width="18"|# !width="190"|Minister !colspan=2 width="80"|Party !width="130"|Term start !width="130"|Term end !width=70|Days in office |- |1 |Ivan Penić |style="background-color: " width="1px"| |HDZ |27 January 1995 |16 December 1996 |align=right | |- |2 |Milan Kovač |style="background-color: " width="1px"| |HDZ |16 December 1996 |1 April 1999 |align=right | |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website Tourism Croatia
title: Ministry of State Property (Croatia)
